column4: Uh hi again. I see the error in this but i don't know how to fix it. The error: I checkinstall anything and this error comes up: /var/tmp/NkDSJgqMeUFmLTWOnegSS/installscript.sh: 4: /home/archoniam/mydocs/el_linux_install_140.zip: Permission denied
Can anyone tell me what's wrong here?
Probably you need to have root permission. Are you doing sudo checkinstall ....
Did sudo or root.
The problem is that the file it's talking about, the installscript.sh... it's not there.
Wait, should i create it again?

installscript.sh is a temporary file that is created by checkinstall and then executed. It's saying that it doesn't have permission to read/write .../el_linux_install_14.zip then the installscript.sh disappears.
Well, i had all the permission on this computer i could get! I even used sudo WHILE BEING ROOT! Still, i keep getting perm denied. You know the problem there?
It depends on whether it's trying to read or write. I can't tell from what you've told me.
The el_linux.zip file - does it exist? What is it? Why is checkinstall trying to touch it?
It's trying to write.
Yes, it exists. It's my eternal lands game ive been trying to install for about ten minutes.
Try to install it without using checkinstall first. If it works, then troubleshoot checkinstall.
Wut? XD | C-{pROF: Wierd, dude. Try sudo login (your login name) . It prompts your password. Enter it. If it dosent work, direct the question to the general public. I'd have no idea from then.
How do i install it without checkinstall? I have no idea here
Hang on. Where is this game? Is it free?
Free game. URL is at http://www.eternal-lands.com/
Hang on. Downloading it now.
Are you running ubuntu feisty?
Dang, did'nt think you would go that far with the Q. Yes, i'm running Feisty 7.04.
It's downloading. Holy moly...23k/s download. I'm gonna go find another mirror. :)
Took me a good 6 minutes to download. If you find a good .deb for it tell me!!
Uhh, wait i need to reg my nick before it.
Nevermind. I'll do it open forum.
